name: Hocus Focus (curlyGoblin)
description:
version 0.01

Hocus Focus is a turn-based combat game in the vein of X-Com and Final Fantasy Tactics. Players will control a group of wizards who need to keep their focus during battle. 

1) Each unit gets two actions per turn

2) Click on the grid, not the unit for accurate selection

3) Switch actions first if you don't want to do something

4) Don't get surrounded and use cover when possible
